B

Barrier - Class in parallel
A class implementing the Barrier concept in parallel/distributed computing.
barrier() - Method in class parallel.Barrier
main method of the class: it waits until _origNumThreads threads enter this method, and it guarantees that if a thread enters this method again before all threads have exited the previous barrier() call it will wait first for all the other threads to exit and then will proceed.
barrier() - Method in class parallel.ComplexBarrier
main method of the class: it waits until _origNumThreads threads enter this method, and it guarantees that if a thread enters this method again before all threads have exited the previous barrier() call it will wait first for all the other threads to exit and then will proceed.
barrier() - Method in class parallel.distributed.DBarrier
the main class method.
BarrierTest - Class in parallel
 
BarrierTest() - Constructor for class parallel.BarrierTest
 
BBGASPPacker - Class in graph.packing
implements a hybrid parallel GASP-Branch&Bound heuristic scheme for the 1- or 2-packing problem in graphs.
BBGASPPacker() - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBGASPPacker
sole public no-arg constructor.
BBNodeComparator1 - Class in graph.packing
Balanced comparator that mostly takes into account the bound-based estimate for the corresponding BB-node (resembling a Best-First Search), turning into Depth-First Search when the bound estimates are close to each other.
BBNodeComparator1() - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBNodeComparator1
 
BBNodeComparator2 - Class in graph.packing
This comparator is Depth-First-Search in spirit, and only differs from DFS when two solutions are "very similar", in which case, the bound of each soln will be the determinant factor in which soln is examined first.
BBNodeComparator2() - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBNodeComparator2
 
BBNodeComparatorIntf - Interface in graph.packing
comparator for BBNode2 objects.
BBThreadPool - Class in graph.packing
wrapper class for the parallel.ParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor class.
BBThreadPool() - Constructor for class graph.packing.BBThreadPool
 
BlockingFasterMsgPassingCoordinator - Class in parallel
The BlockingFasterMsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another class that implements the rendevouz mechanism in parallel programming.
BlockingFasterMsgPassingTest - Class in parallel
 
BlockingFasterMsgPassingTest() - Constructor for class parallel.BlockingFasterMsgPassingTest
 
BlockingMsgPassingCoordinator - Class in parallel
The BlockingMsgPassingCoordinator class is yet another Singleton class that implements the rendevouz mechanism in parallel programming.
BlockingMsgPassingTest - Class in parallel
 
BlockingMsgPassingTest() - Constructor for class parallel.BlockingMsgPassingTest
 
BoundedBuffer - Class in parallel
a bounded-length FIFO buffer implemented as a cyclic doubly-linked list.
BoundedBuffer(int) - Constructor for class parallel.BoundedBuffer
public constructor.
BoundedBufferArray - Class in parallel
a bounded-length FIFO buffer implemented as an Object Array.
